tool_description: Verify Email addresses for existence and deliverability. Includes domain (mx) checks, disposable email address detection, quality scoring.
name: CampaignKit Email Validation
title: CampaignKit Email Validation

api_list.name: /email/validate
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to validate a list of email addresses. The endpoint returns a list of validation results for each email address.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://campaignkit-email-validation.p.rapidapi.com/email/validate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "campaignkit-email-validation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://campaignkit-email-validation.p.rapidapi.com/email/validate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "campaignkit-email-validation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
